comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/51979177@N02] Ha ha!  Flickr doesn't let us do external photos any more, so your link above is as good as it gets.  There seem to be a lot of Hall photos turning up in that Fairfax archive (10.701 images to check!)
